jp.fout.rfp.android.sdk

Class RFP

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.fout.rfp.android.sdk.RFP

  • public class RFP
extends java.lang.Object
    `RFP` is entry point class for starting using RFP SDK. If you want use some RFP functions, write `init` first of all.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context context,
                        java.lang.String mediaId)
        Sets the context and the mediaId from administrator. You should invoke this method before loading any ads.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context object.
        mediaId - The number which was given by system management tool.

      • createInstreamAdAdapter

        public static <T extends android.widget.ListAdapter> RFPInstreamAdAdapter<T> createInstreamAdAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                     T originalAdapter,
                                                                                                     java.lang.String adSpotId)
        `RFPInstreamAdAdapter` is for loading instream type advertisements. It's recommended for app using ListView / ListAdapter to invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context object.
        originalAdapter - Adapter to be bound
        adSpotId - adSpotId to be registered in advance
        See Also:
        RFPInstreamAdAdapter

      • createInstreamAdAdapter

        public static <T extends android.widget.ListAdapter> RFPInstreamAdAdapter<T> createInstreamAdAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                                     T originalAdapter,
                                                                                                     java.lang.String adSpotId,
                                                                                                     int adCount,
                                                                                                     java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        `RFPInstreamAdAdapter` is for loading instream type advertisements. It's recommended for app using ListView / ListAdapter to invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context object.
        originalAdapter - Adapter to be bound
        adSpotId - adSpotId to be registered in advance
        adCount - advertisement information count to be received in the callback. If 0 is given, pre-registered is selected.
        positions - each ad position to be inserted into table in order to control ad position. If null is given, pre-registered is selected.
        See Also:
        RFPInstreamAdAdapter

      • createInstreamAdPlacer

        public static RFPInstreamAdPlacer createInstreamAdPlacer(android.content.Context context,
                                                         java.lang.String adSpotId)
        `RFPInstreamAdPlacer` is for loading instream type advertisements. It's recommended for app not using ListView / ListAdapter to invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context object.
        adSpotId - adSpotId to be registered in advance
        See Also:
        RFPInstreamAdPlacer

      • createInstreamAdPlacer

        public static RFPInstreamAdPlacer createInstreamAdPlacer(android.content.Context context,
                                                         java.lang.String adSpotId,
                                                         int adCount,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        `RFPInstreamAdPlacer` is for loading instream type advertisements. It's recommended for app not using ListView / ListAdapter to invoke this method.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context object.
        adSpotId - adSpotId to be registered in advance
        adCount - advertisement information count to be received in the callback. If 0 is given, pre-registered is selected.
        positions - each ad position to be inserted into table in order to control ad position. If null is given, pre-registered is selected.
        See Also:
        RFPInstreamAdPlacer

        Parameters:
        muteLogOutput - boolean flag to mute log output
